sourcesContent:
<template>
  <gantt-elastic :tasks="tasks" :options="options"></gantt-elastic>
</template>

<script>
import GanttElastic from 'gantt-elastic';

export default {
  components: {
    'gantt-elastic': GanttElastic,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      tasks: [
        {
          id: 1,
          label: 'Product A',
          start: new Date('2024-05-15').getTime(),
          duration: 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000, // 1 day in milliseconds
          // Additional configurations...
        },
        // More tasks...
      ],
      options: {
        // Custom options...
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>
